content.description: The displayed content can also be passed into the DOM via 'slot#content'
content.description_zh: 显示的内容，也可以通过 `slot#content` 传入 DOM

placement.default: top | top-start | top-end | bottom | bottom-start | bottom-end | left | left-start | left-end | right | right-start | right-end

value.description: Whether the status is visible or not

:v-model.description: Whether the status is visible or not

:offset.description: The offset of the occurrence position

visible-arrow.description: Whether or not to display the Tooltip arrow, more parameters can be seen in [vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)
visible-arrow.description_zh: 是否显示 Tooltip 箭头，更多参数可见[Vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)

manual.description: Manual control mode, when set to true, the mouseenter and mouseleave events will not take effect
manual.description_zh: 手动控制模式，设置为 true 后，mouseenter 和 mouseleave 事件将不会生效

popper-class.description: Add a class name to the popper of Tooltip
popper-class.description_zh: 为 Tooltip 的 popper 添加类名

enterable.description: Whether the mouse can enter the tooltip
enterable.description_zh: 鼠标是否可进入到 tooltip 中

:hide-after.description: The delay of auto-hiding after the Tooltip appears, in milliseconds, and 0 will not be automatically hidden
:hide-after.description_zh: Tooltip 出现后自动隐藏延时，单位毫秒，为 0 则不会自动隐藏
